Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:24:53
Folder: C1EQGNL - 30 farizon vans leasing
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1EQGNL_00
From: Jackie Merchant <jmerchant@ev-lab.io>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Saadeddine Elnakib <selnakib@ev-lab.io>; Kevin Chalhoub <Kevin.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-09-17 15:37
Subject: 30 Farizon vans leasing
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Hagop,


Good day to you.




As you know, we have successfully launched our Farizon van leasing program. We currently have a client who has nearly confirmed the quotation and is eager to move forward with the lease agreement. However, we've encountered a critical obstacle that requires your immediate attention.




The client operates a last-mile delivery company where drivers are personally responsible for excess charges. The current excess amount of 5,000 AED represents a significant burden that makes this deal commercially unviable. To put this in perspective, standard excess charges typically range below 1,000 AED for vehicles in this category, even for vans valued at 135,000 AED.

The client operates a last-mile delivery company where drivers are personally responsible for excess charges. The current excess amount of 5,000 AED represents a significant burden that makes this deal commercially unviable. To put this in perspective, standard excess charges typically range below 1,000 AED for vehicles in this category, even for vans valued at 135,000 AED.




This high excess charge is the sole barrier preventing us from closing this transaction. We urgently need your support and NASCO's assistance to reduce the excess charges to below 1,000 AED to ensure this deal moves forward successfully.




I would appreciate your prompt consideration of this matter, as the client is ready to proceed once this issue is resolved.




Best regards,

Jackie Merchant 
EV Leasing & Rental
+971 58 541 4500
 <https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1-Ddizmpxe9_kDi6uzmzWJjHqGqyKkU0f&export=download> 
Building 6, The Greenhouse
Dubai Design District
Dubai, UAE
